name: Sushi Blast (itch)
description:
Feed the world and save the day! It’s Sushi Blast! You are the Sushi Chef, and your restaurant is in desperate need of customers! Take to the streets and meet your customers where they're at. Rack up Yen Coins and Lucky Golden Cats in this arcade-style sushi shoot-em-up as you travel around the world to serve the best slice of fish.

Sushi Blast features:
● Pick-up-and-play fun with easy touch controls
● Increasingly challenging levels and level bosses
● Blast away with sushi powerups like Magnet Roll, Shuriken Roll, and the Sumo Roll
● Wacky costumes, awesome boats, and skill upgrades
● Beautiful locales around the world, from the Tea Gardens to Egypt and beyond 
● Colorful characters, cheery graphics, and an upbeat soundtrack
● Feed people instead of killing them! Less death = nice idea!

More info: http://evokegames.com/sushiblast/
